headline: FDA Accepts Pfizer (PFE) Vepdegestrant NDA for Breast Cancer, Fast Track Designation Awarded
summary: Pfizer (PFE) recently announced that the U.S. Food and Drug Administration accepted the New Drug Application for vepdegestrant, offering potential new treatment options for certain breast cancer patients with a PDUFA action date in June 2026. During the last quarter, Pfizer's share price rose by 10%, a movement that stands out against a broader market rise, driven by strong earnings reported across various sectors. Notably, the FDA's acceptance and other positive product-related...
